divs: sighting detailsi'm 18 years old and have lived in clearwater, florida my whole life. i live near macdill air force base so that could be an explanation for some weird craft. but in the past 6 months at night on a weekly basis i have seen the 3 main types of ufos: cigars, saucers, and triangles. cigars fly across my county on a regular basis flying low or high making no noise. i have seen wobbling saucers with several lights on the underbelly pass low and slowly over me and my friends. but the most interesting and most convincing sightings i've seen are the famous black floating triangles. the first time i saw it had a vast array of lights underneath that appeared to be scanning. the 2 headlights were intensely bright and it headed straight for us. it was flying silently north at about 1500 ft so we started waving at it. before it reached us it turned sharply towards tampa, avoiding us. another time it was hovering over my neighborhood as i was driving home. the triangle had 3 bright white lights on each tip and a red blinking light in the middle. the triangle tilted down, floated to the right, then to the left, then it rapidly accelerated towards the north. this sighting was very similar to a youtube video i saw of a triangle sighting (http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=wsi3wr1eyha). i have seen several more silent triangle flybys since these sightings, one of which was covered in dim blue lights and was the length of a football field. i stare at the sky a lot now and i always notice stars that start moving or turn off. i may also see distant objects moving slowly, stopping in mid flight, and resuming flight in a different direction. all of these events have sparked in me a mad craze for ufos. this just reaffirms for me that it is most likely that extraterrestrials visit our planet on a regular basis due to the technology witnessed. i���m not totally excluding the fact that that they could be completely man made, but there are mathematical equations that show the rate of technological advancement (moore���s law). if anyone has any insight on these occurrences or if you have seen any of these similar objects please write me an email at glasermark@juno.com. peace out and let them fix the world.
